NOTES:

Well got passed a nice file for this so went to work on it.. crop, resize, denoise, slight rgb, hue and saturation
adjustment then had to brighten it up sum as dark scenes are a lil dark but its a dark movie even in theater then
sharpened it back up sum and then synced and muxed the ok LiNE we had for it the audio does still have sum static as we
couldnt remove it all but its better than CAM.. enjoy til retail as u wont get any better till then
